name: Gunkfar's Gunkbar
description:
Welcome to Gunkfar's Gunkbar!

You are a wizard potion maker at the popular Gunkfar's Gunkbar. Your task is to make potions for customers and satisfy their magical drinking needs. Using a mix of ingredients and the recipes located on the shelf behind you, you must make each drink for the customer to order by tossing the correct ingredients into the cauldron behind you, filling the potion bottle by dipping it in, and then shake it up to mix. Place the completed drink on the customer's coaster to send the order. 3 wrong orders and you lose the game!
